bill.title: Public employees' health insurance; authorize purchase of supplemental policy for active employees who are Medicare eligible.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 25-15-101, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Political Subdivisions To Negotiate For And Secure For All Medicare Eligible Employees And Their Dependents A Supplemental Health Insurance Policy That May Be Offered On A Voluntary Basis To Any Such Employee Who Rejects Group Coverage Under This Section; To Amend Section 25-15-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The State And School Employees Health Insurance Management Board To Negotiate For And Secure For All Active Employees Who Are Medicare Eligible And Their Dependents A Supplemental Health Insurance Policy That May Be Offered On A Voluntary Basis To Any Such Employee Who Rejects Group Coverage Under The Plan; And For Related Purposes.
